channel.title: Oakley Transistor OX3085 – Men’s Designer Eyewear
channel.description: What started out as one man with $300 in his garage in California, has turned into a multi-billion dollar corporation. Now owned by Italian firm, Luxottica, who also boast Ray Ban and Vogue in their portfolio, Oakley are now one of the world’s premier designer eyewear manufacturers. Oakley was started in 1975 by Jim Jannard, [...]
